favourite.article: Thank You Lord for finding us and bringing us to the church!
Praise the Lord! Only the living water can satisfy us!

I love this song! what a wonder and awesome thing this is that Jesus is our life! Thank You Lord for bringing us to the church. Thank You. May You gain Your heart's desire, Your kingdom here on earth, Amen!
Praise the Lord for Jesus. Hallelujah!
I love this song! It shows that only the Lord as the living fountain can satisfy man's thirst! Praise the Lord that we already have HIM within us!!! =)
This song brings me with joy, saying that you won't be satisfied with just regular water, you need the living water!!!
